main(String[]) - Static method in class com.singleton.clone.CloneSingleton

MultipileClassLoader - Class in com.singleton.multiclassloader
Multiple class loaders will create multiple instance for a singleton class
Fix: Create object eagerly and through Runtime exception in the private constructor
MultithreadedSingleton - Class in com.singleton.multithread
Singleton will be violated in singleton
Fix: Using double check locking synchronized, set variable as volatile to avoid half backed object
can use Holder which is kind of eager loading
